Back in the nineteen seventies while I was working in Canada as a travel agent we pioneered a number of what were then ' unique smart partnerships ' with airlines and hotel groupings .
One of the most successful was an arrangement with Wardair on the Winnipeg - Gatwick ( London ) route , where our agency block booked groups on certain dates to obtain a lower price .
The benefit to the traveller , our customer , was that if they flew on these particular specified dates , they would get their first or last night 's airport accommodation at no extra cost .
